title: The Cypress Hills Series Samantha's Legacy
description: For a millennia, the land that Samantha's farm house sits upon has been cursed. Cypress Hills Farm had once been a thriving homestead that helped create the town that now sits outside it's boundaries. Sixteen year Samantha Walsh has had plenty of tragedy in her life, but now the next victim could possibly be her. Racing against time, she must discover a way to break the curse and save not just herself , but her family as well.
author: Angel Ernst
